Verses: 1 naan Dhevanukku Munbaagavum Uyirodirukkiravargalaiyum Mariththavargalaiyum Niyaayantheerkkappogira Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvukku Munbaagavum, Avarudaiya Pirasannamaagudhalaiyum Avarudaiya Raajyaththaiyum Saatchiyaaga Vaiththuk Kattalaiyidugiradhaavadhu:
2 samayam Vaaiththaalum Vaaikkaavittaalum Jaakkiradhaiyaaith Thiruvasanaththaip Pirasangampannu; Ellaa Neediya Saandhaththodum Ubadhesaththodum Kandanam Panni, Kadindhukondu, Buththisollu.
3 enendraal, Avargal Aarokkiyamaana Ubadhesaththaip Porukkamanadhillaamal, Seviththinavullavargalaagi, Thangal Suya Ichchaigalukketra Podhagargalaith Thangalukkuth Thiralaaga Serththukkondu,
4 saththiyaththukku Seviyai Vilakki, Kattukkadhaigalukku Saaindhupogunkaalam Varum.
5 neeyo Ellaavatrilum Manaththelivullavanaayiru, Theenganubavi, Suviseshaganudaiya Velaiyaich Sey, Un Oozhiyaththai Niraivetru.
6 enendraal, Naan Ippozhudhe Baanabaliyaaga Vaarkkappattuppogiren; Naan Dhegaththai Vittup Piriyumkaalam Vandhadhu.
7 nalla Poraattaththaip Poraadinen, Ottaththai Mudiththen, Visuvaasaththaik Kaaththukkonden.

8 idhumudhal Needhiyin Kireedam Enakkaaga Vaikkappattirukkiradhu, Needhiyulla Niyaayaadhibadhiyaagiya Karththar Annaalile Adhai Enakkuth Thandharuluvaar; Enakku Maaththiramalla, Avar Pirasannamaagudhalai Virumbum Yaavarukkum Adhaith Thandharuluvaar.
9 nee Seekkiramaai Ennidaththil Varumpadi Jaakkiradhaippadu.

10 enendraal, Themaa Ippirapanjaththinmel Aasaivaiththu, Ennaivittuppirindhu, Thesalonikke Pattanaththukkup Poivittaan; Gireske Kalaaththiyaa Naattirkum, Theeththu Thalmaaththiyaa Naattirkum Poivittaargal.
11 lookkaa Maaththiram Ennode Irukkiraan. Maarkuvai Unnode Koottikkonduvaa; Oozhiyaththil Avan Enakkup Pirayojanamullavan.
12 theegikkuvai Naan Ebesuvukku Anuppinen.
13 thurovaa Pattanaththilirukkira Kaarppu Enbavan Vasaththil Naan Vaiththuvandha Melangiyaiyum, Pusthagangalaiyum, Viseshamaaith Thorsurulgalaiyum, Nee Varugirabodhu Eduththukkonduvaa.
14 kannaanaagiya Aleksandhar Enakku Vegu Theemaiseydhaan; Avanudaiya Seygaikkuththakkadhaagak Karththar Avanukkup Badhilalippaaraaga.
15 neeyum Avanaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayiru; Avan Nammudaiya Vaarththaigalukku Migavum Edhirththu Nindravan.
16 naan Mudhalvisai Uththaravusolla Nirkaiyil Oruvanum Ennodekooda Irukkavillai, Ellaarum Ennaikkaivittaargal; Andhak Kutram Avargalmel Sumaraadhiruppadhaaga.

17 karththaro Enakkuth Thunaiyaaga Nindru, Ennaale Pirasangam Niraiverugiradharkaagavum, Purajaadhiyaar Ketkiradharkaagavum, Ennaip Balappaduththinaar; Singaththin Vaayilirundhum Naan Ratchikkappatten.
18 karththar Ellaath Theemaiyinindrum Ennai Ratchiththu, Thammudaiya Parama Raajyaththai Adaiyumpadi Kaappaatruvaar; Avarukkuch Sadhaakaalangalilum Magimai Undaavadhaaga. Aamen.
19 piriskaalukkum Aakkillaavukkum, Onesipporuvin Veettaarukkum En Vaazhththudhalaich Sollu.
20 erasthu Korindhupattanaththil Irundhuvittaan; Dhuroppeemuvai Mileththuvil Viyaadhippattavanaaga Vittuvandhen.
21 maarikaalaththukkumun Nee Vandhu Serumpadi Jaakkiradhaippadu. Aipooluvum, Pudhenjum, Leenuvum, Kalavudhiyaalum, Matrellaach Sagodhararum Unakku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
22 karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Un Aaviyudanekooda Iruppaaraaga. Kirubai Ungalodiruppadhaaga. Aamen.
